thread.section_title: Ruby Lane Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ruby Lane | www.rubylane.com
thread.title: Sharie Connelly
thread.title_full: Ruby Lane reviewed by Sharie Connelly

author: Sharie Connelly
title: Sharie Connelly
text: I enjoy Ruby Lane and only purchase the items I collect from them. They have excellent sellers, great sales throughout the year at 30% up to 50%. I have never had a bad experience with my purchases from any of the shops even the ones over sea's that may not understand the English language entirely. As a shopper on the site, I do share with friends and co-workers where I get my unique items. Just love this site and you will too!
